text: Is there a quick writeup on how to utilize the ha-krib plugin?
<@UA98B96BA> the ha-krib is now folded in to the open "krib" content (it contains ha-krib) ... <@U02DHRR2L> is working on updates very very actively this week - including documentation
Yeah, I saw the plugin come in with the krib content. I'm about to start messing with it and figured I would ask if you had anything written up yet.

the "official" documentation location is:
<https://provision.readthedocs.io/en/tip/doc/integrations/krib.html>
but it doesn't contain the HA pieces yet - and it still references the older `change-stage/map` workflow system (deprecated in favor of `Workflows`)

there is some new "content" package documentation on it:
<https://provision.readthedocs.io/en/tip/doc/content-packages/krib.html>
perfect, thanks <@U6QFVRJNB>

we should hopefully have all of the documentation updated in the next few days - so hopefully mid-week next week things will look a lot better - again Rob is working quite actively on the content pack right now to clean things up, and enhance it
I'm planning to get a few videos posted shortly
showing the basics - I was able to do a full run last night
there are some tricks to know about cleanup for multiple runs
I found a bug in the rackn portal, whats the best way to report it?
you can submit here:  <https://github.com/digitalrebar/provision/issues/new>

attachments.title: Build software better, together
attachments.text: GitHub is where people build software. More than 28 million people use GitHub to discover, fork, and contribute to over 85 million projects.

text: If you could label it `provision-ux-bug`
It doesn't look like i can add labels, but the bug is here: <https://github.com/digitalrebar/provision/issues/931>

attachments.title: Error while editing stage in RackN Portal 路 Issue #931 路 digitalrebar/provision
attachments.text: When editing a stage, the task list does not automatically update the index of the elements, and blank elements are not ignored when saving. When cloning a stage with the intent of removing one of ...
attachments.fallback: GitHub: Error while editing stage in RackN Portal 路 Issue #931 路 digitalrebar/provision

text: Ok - we'll (<@U02DHRR2L>) take a look - thank you <@UAKCC9HQU>
1) You have to manually remove the blanks - there's delete button for that. We cannot make assumptions about blanks.
Is that done some other way than clicking the X next to the task in the task list?
not in the UX
it's just an ordered list in the data model
we did not code reorder in the UX
Clone -> Delete Last Task -> Add: Works
Clone -> Delete Middle Task -> Add: Error
and I don't see any way to fix the error in the UI

I'll take a look.

FWIW: We STRONGLY recommend using the bundle development pattern when building new workflow / stages / etc.  The UX was not designed for component development.
<@UAKCC9HQU> I see the problem
Yeah, this is just for a one off thing / exploration . Its a simple stage, so I can just re-create it by hand.
Since it works fine as long as you go in order.
We have a video training on the bundle upload pattern.
which is very productive even on small edits
and encourages good content management practices
<@UAKCC9HQU> I was able to find and fix the issue (using delete instead of splice).  It will go through the process and should be available in the tip UX tomorrow.
cool, thanks for the quick fix <@U02DHRR2L>
was a very simple fix!  we (RackN) don't use the UX for much editing, so it's helpful to get bugs like that reported.  It was a common component, so likely other list selectors were also broken.
